name: Knak
description:
Welcome to the page of Knäk. Knäk is an action packed retro platformer made in GODOT. Made by 2 students from the Netherlands. 

Here is our Git: https://github.com/vaporlain/Knak-Legends 

Here is the webversion andreos.nl/knak 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move including up to jump (and double-jump)

E or ctrl to attack

Controller is (a little bit) supported
